item.title: Custom Outdoor Fully Assembled Office Pod from China | Factory Direct Price
item.description:
Outdoor Fully Assembled Office Pod from China Manufacturer

Factory Direct Price · Customizable Sizes · Plug & Play Setup

As one of the most reliable outdoor fully assembled office pod manufacturers in China, we specialize in building high-quality, customizable prefab office pods ready for immediate use. Whether for a backyard home office, a mobile workspace, or a quiet retreat, our pods are designed for comfort, durability, and easy installation.

Each pod is fully assembled in our factory, shipped as a finished unit, and requires no on-site construction or labor cost. With optional built-in furniture, smart heating, and LED lighting, you can start using it as soon as it arrives.

item.title: Custom Soundproof Studio Pod from China | Factory Direct Price
item.description:
Custom Soundproof Studio Pod from China Manufacturer

Factory Direct Price · Custom Design · Fast Delivery Worldwide

As one of the most professional soundproof studio pod manufacturers in China, we offer high-quality, affordable, and customizable pods that are ideal for remote work, live streaming, podcasting, and private calls.

Each prefab pod is fully equipped with a working desk, storage cabinets, WiFi setup, and optional smart heating or furniture, allowing you to get started right after delivery — no extra installation required.
